Description: Rounded ring foot and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery bowl; wholly glazed save for stand surface and underside, on which there is a central dot and ring and two rings further out; kiln stacking ghost on interior; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 382) ((Dedications to Apollo))
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1836)
